body_html:
cp35 is for python 3.5 . I hope you are using the correct version.
Also, I hope you are creating a virtual environment inside anaconda for tensorflow.

Use the procedure here. https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows

I dont think there could be any problem installing tensorflow with anaconda. It is one of the cleanest way to install TF

body:
cp35 is for python 3.5 . I hope you are using the correct version. 
Also, I hope you are creating a virtual environment inside anaconda for tensorflow.

Use the procedure here. https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows

I dont think there could be any problem installing tensorflow with anaconda. It is one of the cleanest way to install TF
